thread.title: Cano Health Acquires Tampa-Based Rangel Medical Center

author: cnbc.com
title: Cano Health Acquires Tampa-Based Rangel Medical Center

organizations.name: cano health acquires tampa-based rangel medical center

text:
MIAMI, March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Cano Health, LLC, a leading population health management company and operator of primary care medical centers in Florida, today announced that it has acquired Rangel Medical Center, a Tampa-based primary care company that specializes in family medicine, internal medicine and geriatric care.
With three clinic locations, Rangel Medical offers collaborative medical care across a range of services to deliver industry leading health outcomes. The acquisition marks Cano's expansion outside of South Florida, and now with 13 locations, extends its proven approach to primary care.
"We are thrilled to have the professionals of Rangel Medical Center – led by Orlando Rangel, MD – join the Cano family," said Dr. Marlow Hernandez, Chief Executive Officer of Cano Health. "Their focus on patient-centered care to improve health outcomes makes Rangel a perfect fit for us. We are also very excited to extend our services to the Tampa/St. Petersburg area, as we continue to make our services available to patients throughout Florida."
As part of its personalized approach to primary care, Rangel Medical offers 24/7 access to a healthcare professional; same day appointments for sick visits; transportation to/from clinics; dedicated Patient Care Coordinators and Case Managers; in-house diagnostic testing; diabetic testing supplies; health education seminars; nutrition education; and more.
"Our commitment to the Tampa community is strong. It was important for us to find a partner with the same values that we have always maintained," said Rangel Medical Center Founder and Medical Director Orlando Rangel, MD. "Like Cano Health, ours is a family business – and that business is helping take care of individuals, families, and communities. We have built our practice on personalized care and medical excellence. Our partnership with Cano Health allows us to continue to provide the same level of care while expanding our service offerings to our patients. We look forward to adding a myriad of wellness activities along with physiotherapy services led by Dr. Rafael Rey and his team of expert clinicians."
About Cano Health
Cano Health, LLC operates health care centers and pharmacies in South Florida that specialize in Senior Care and Primary Care for all ages. Cano Health also provides a suite of population health management services. Cano Health's mission is to improve patient health by delivering superior primary care medical services, while forging a life-long bond with its patients. For more information visit www.canohealth.com .
